targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("td_sent_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}_.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(500ms), "source_id"
SELECT last("td_sent_count") FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}_.*/) GROUP BY "source_id"
SELECT distinct("records_written") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datawriterinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}_.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(500ms), "source_id"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("td_total_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}_.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(500ms)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("td_sent_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.trigger.moduleleveltriggerinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}_.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(500ms)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("new_records_received")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datawriterinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}_.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("new_records_written")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datawriterinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}_.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("generated_hsi_events_counter"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.timinglibs.fakehsieventgeneratorinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}_.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(500ms) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("sent_hsi_events_counter"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.timinglibs.fakehsieventgeneratorinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}_.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(500ms) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(distinct("bytes_output"), 1s)  / 1048576 FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datawriterinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}_.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"
fill(null)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time,severity,application_name,issue_name,message,host_name
FROM public."ErrorReports"
WHERE partition='${partition}'
ORDER BY -time

targets.query: SELECT mean("average_millisecond_per_trigger") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}_.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)
SELECT sum("num_chunks_processed_with_error") FROM "dunedaq.flxlibs.felixcardreaderinfo.ELinkInfo" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}_.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("num_blocks_processed_with_error") FROM "dunedaq.flxlibs.felixcardreaderinfo.ELinkInfo" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}_.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

params.q: SHOW SERIES FROM "dunedaq.appfwk.appinfo.Info" WHERE time >= 1646496091968ms and time <= 1646668891968ms
